title: 40 multinational firms awarded for innovation (Shanghai Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Shanghai Municipal Government ) Foreign multinational companies that contributed to Shanghai 's development as a global technology and innovation center were awarded prizes at a glittering ceremony in the city on Thursday. There were
